session.title: Messaging and Concurrency in a Spring Environment
session.body: Outline: Message-Oriented Architectures: messaging versus asynchronous task execution (10 min) Synchronous JMS Messaging in Spring: JMS setup examples, JmsTemplate usage (15 min) Asynchronous JMS Messaging in Spring: message listener container examples (20 min) Spring's TaskExecutor abstraction and other related Spring facilities (10 min)
